Line 14: Line 14:
=== Linux ===
=== Linux ===
  +
[[Image:Ubuntu 8.04.png|220px|thumb|right|[[Ubuntu (Linux distribution)|ubuntu]], a popular [[Linux distribution]], one of many available]]
As there are a large number of [[Linux distribution|Linux distributions]], there are many organizations involved in [[Linux]] advocacy, including companies directly involved in the development of distributions as well as purely advocacy-based groups, such as [[SEUL]]. Promotion takes on a wide variety of forms from [[plush toy|plush toys]] to [[t-shirt|t-shirts]] and [[poster|posters]], and even to more unorthodox forms, such as body paints and video games.
As there are a large number of [[Linux distribution|Linux distributions]], there are many organizations involved in [[Linux]] advocacy, including companies directly involved in the development of distributions as well as purely advocacy-based groups, such as [[SEUL]]. Promotion takes on a wide variety of forms from [[plush toy|plush toys]] to [[t-shirt|t-shirts]] and [[poster|posters]], and even to more unorthodox forms, such as body paints and video games.
